name: product_promotion_6
description: Promotional post template for Orchid featuring a baby image, bold headline, and CTA button.

samples.heading: Baby Care Essentials
samples.subheading: Gentle and safe products for your little one

fieldPrompt.background_image_url: generate a prompt for a soft, pastel-colored background image. For best results, use a subtle pattern or gradient that complements baby products (e.g., soft blues, pinks, or yellows).
fieldPrompt.product_image: generate a prompt for a high-quality image of the business product. The image should be well-lit, professional, and evoke warmth and care. For best results, use an image with a transparent background or a clean, uncluttered background.
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Upload your company logo. For best results, use a high-resolution image with a transparent background that represents your baby care brand.
fieldPrompt.heading: Enter a short, engaging heading for baby products (max 25 characters). Example: 'Gentle Care for Little Ones', 'Baby's Happy Skin'.
fieldPrompt.subheading: Write a brief description of your baby care products (max 100 characters). Example: 'Hypoallergenic and dermatologist-tested for your baby's delicate skin'.
fieldPrompt.button_text: Enter a clear call-to-action (max 20 characters). Example: 'Shop Now', 'Learn More', 'See Collection'.
